dcterms:description: The HuggingFace phishing dataset represents a rich compilation of phishing datasets sourced from reputable repositories and tailored specifically for classification and phishing detection tasks. This dataset comprises a heterogeneous mix of textual samples, including URLs, SMS messages, email messages, and HTML code. Each record within this dataset is meticulously labeled as either 1 (indicating phishing) or 0 (indicating benign), providing a foundational framework for experimentation.
dcterms:title: HuggingFace Phishing Dataset

dcterms:creator: Arifa I Champa
Md Fazle Rabbi
Minhaz F Zibran
dcterms:description: The Nazario and Nigerian Fraud Dataset consists of two datasets: Nazario 5 and Nigeria 5, which provide a comprehensive collection of both legitimate and phishing-related communications. The Nazario 5 dataset includes a diverse array of legitimate emails and phishing emails, while the Nigeria 5 dataset captures fraudulent emails, particularly focusing on the well-known Nigerian Letter scams.
dcterms:title: Nazario and Nigerian Fraud Dataset
